dialogue: It only took you four hours to get me all the way down to the manufacturer's suggested retail price.
There's no profit left!! My family will go hungry!! Bwaa! Bwaa!
I assume you want the rust inhibitor coating for only $500.
We also have an invisible spray that protects against scurvy and tax audits.
Initial here if you want your airbag to be full of fresh Aspen air instead of gravel.
And the lease terms are engraved on this free hood ornament!
Be glad they didn't install it.
